Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Alere Influenza A & B Test Strip
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere™ Influenza A & B Test using lateral flow immunochromatographic assay for detection of influenza A and B nucleoprotein antigens in nasal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of influenza A and B nucleoprotein antigens in nasal swab specimens from symptomatic patients to aid in rapid differential diagnosis of influenza A and B infections; negative results are presumptive and should be confirmed by cell culture or FDA-cleared molecular assay.
